)

compute the maximum of double vector 

00093                                       {
00094     if(!p) return 0;
00095     double a=p[0];
00096     for(long i=1; i<n; i++){
00097     if(p[i]>a) a=p[i];
00098     }
00099     return a;
00100 }

)

inplace inversion of square SPD matrix.

A=A^-1 

00141                                       {
00142     int N=n;
00143     int info;
00144     char uplo='U';
00145     /*B is identity matrix*/
00146     double *B=calloc(N*N, sizeof(double));
00147     for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
00148     B[i+i*N]=1;
00149     
00150     dposv_(&uplo,&N,&N,A,&N,B,&N,&info);
00151     memcpy(A,B,N*N);
00152     free(B);
00153 }
